00044 #if CPU_CM3_SAM3X
00045     #define PMC_BASE  0x400E0600
00046 #else
00047     #define PMC_BASE  0x400E0400
00048 #endif

00053 /*\{*/
00054 #define PMC_SCER_OFF  0x00         ///< System Clock Enable Register
00055 #define PMC_SCDR_OFF  0x04         ///< System Clock Disable Register
00056 #define PMC_SCSR_OFF  0x08         ///< System Clock Status Register
00057 #define PMC_MOR_OFF   0x20         ///< Main Oscillator Register
00058 #define PMC_MCFR_OFF  0x24         ///< Main Clock Frequency Register
00059 #define PMC_MCKR_OFF  0x30         ///< Master Clock Register
00060 #define PMC_IER_OFF   0x60         ///< Interrupt Enable Register
00061 #define PMC_IDR_OFF   0x64         ///< Interrupt Disable Register
00062 #define PMC_SR_OFF    0x68         ///< Status Register
00063 #define PMC_IMR_OFF   0x6C         ///< Interrupt Mask Register
00064 #define PMC_FSMR_OFF  0x70         ///< Fast Startup Mode Register
00065 #define PMC_FSPR_OFF  0x74         ///< Fast Startup Polarity Register
00066 #define PMC_FOCR_OFF  0x78         ///< Fault Output Clear Register
00067 #define PMC_WPMR_OFF  0xE4         ///< Write Protect Mode Register
00068 #define PMC_WPSR_OFF  0xE8         ///< Write Protect Status Register
00069 
00070 #if CPU_CM3_SAM3N
00071     #define PMC_PCER_OFF   0x10    ///< Peripheral Clock Enable Register
00072     #define PMC_PCDR_OFF   0x14    ///< Peripheral Clock Disable Register
00073     #define PMC_PCSR_OFF   0x18    ///< Peripheral Clock Status Register
00074     #define PMC_PLLR_OFF   0x28    ///< PLL Register
00075     #define PMC_PCK_OFF    0x40    ///< Programmable Clock 0 Register
00076     #define PMC_OCR_OFF    0x110   ///< Oscillator Calibration Register
00077 #elif CPU_CM3_SAM3X
00078     #define PMC_PCER0_OFF  0x10    ///< Peripheral Clock Enable Register
00079     #define PMC_PCDR0_OFF  0x14    ///< Peripheral Clock Disable Register
00080     #define PMC_PCSR0_OFF  0x18    ///< Peripheral Clock Status Register
00081     #define PMC_UCKR_OFF   0x1C    ///< UTMI clock register
00082     #define PMC_PLLAR_OFF  0x28    ///< PLL Register
00083     #define PMC_USB_OFF    0x38    ///< USB clock register
00084     #define PMC_PCK0_OFF   0x40    ///< Programmable Clock 0 Register
00085     #define PMC_PCK1_OFF   0x44    ///< Programmable Clock 1 Register
00086     #define PMC_PCK2_OFF   0x48    ///< Programmable Clock 2 Register
00087     #define PMC_PCER1_OFF  0x100   ///< Peripheral Clock Enable Register
00088     #define PMC_PCDR1_OFF  0x104   ///< Peripheral Clock Disable Register
00089     #define PMC_PCSR1_OFF  0x108   ///< Peripheral Clock Status Register
00090     #define PMC_PCR_OFF    0x10C   ///< Oscillator Calibration Register
00091 
00092     #define PMC_PLLROFF    PMC_PLLAR_OFF
00093 #else
00094     #warning Some PMC registers undefined for the selected CPU
00095 #endif
00096 /*\}*/

00121 #define PMC_SCER  (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_SCER_OFF)))   ///< System Clock Enable Register
00122 #define PMC_SCDR  (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_SCDR_OFF)))   ///< System Clock Disable Register
00123 #define PMC_SCSR  (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_SCSR_OFF)))   ///< System Clock Status Register

00125 #define CKGR_MCFR (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_MCFR_OFF)))   ///< Main Clock Frequency Register
00126 #define PMC_MCKR  (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_MCKR_OFF)))   ///< Master Clock Register
00127 #define PMC_IER   (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_IER_OFF )))   ///< Interrupt Enable Register
00128 #define PMC_IDR   (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_IDR_OFF )))   ///< Interrupt Disable Register
00129 #define PMC_SR    (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_SR_OFF  )))   ///< Status Register
00130 #define PMC_IMR   (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_IMR_OFF )))   ///< Interrupt Mask Register

00152     #define PMC_PCK1   (*((reg32_t *)(PMC_BASE + PMC_PCK1_OFF)))     ///< Programmable Clock 1 Register

00168 #ifdef PMC_PCER1
00169 
00170 INLINE void pmc_periphEnable(unsigned id)
00171 {
00172     ASSERT(id < 64);
00173     if (id < 32)
00174         PMC_PCER0 = BV(id);
00175     else
00176         PMC_PCER1 = BV(id - 32);
00177 }
00178 
00179 #else
00180 
00181 INLINE void pmc_periphEnable(unsigned id)
00182 {
00183     ASSERT(id < 32);
00184     PMC_PCER = BV(id);
00185 }
00186 
00187 #endif
00188 
00194 #ifdef PMC_PCER1
00195 
00196 INLINE void pmc_periphDisable(unsigned id)
00197 {
00198     ASSERT(id < 64);
00199     if (id < 32)
00200         PMC_PCDR0 = BV(id);
00201     else
00202         PMC_PCDR1 = BV(id - 32);
00203 }
00204 
00205 #else
00206 
00207 INLINE void pmc_periphDisable(unsigned id)
00208 {
00209     ASSERT(id < 32);
00210     PMC_PCDR = BV(id);
00211 }
00212 
00213 #endif

00246 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTEN         0   ///< Main Crystal Oscillator Enable
00247 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTBY         1   ///< Main Crystal Oscillator Bypass
00248 #define CKGR_MOR_WAITMODE         2   ///< Wait Mode Command
00249 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCEN         3   ///< Main On-Chip RC Oscillator Enable
00250 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT    4
00251 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_MASK     (0x7 << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT)   ///< Main On-Chip RC Oscillator Frequency Selection
00252 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF(value)   ((CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_MASK & ((value) << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT)))
00253 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_4MHZ   (0x0 << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT)
00254 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_8MHZ   (0x1 << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT)
00255 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_12MHZ  (0x2 << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_SHIFT)
00256 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_SHIFT   8
00257 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_MASK    (0xff << CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_SHIFT)   ///< Main Crystal Oscillator Start-up Time
00258 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST(value)  ((CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_MASK & ((value) << CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_SHIFT)))
00259 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY_SHIFT        16
00260 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY_MASK         (0xffu << CKGR_MOR_KEY_SHIFT)   ///< Password
00261 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY(value)       ((CKGR_MOR_KEY_MASK & ((value) << CKGR_MOR_KEY_SHIFT)))
00262 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCSEL          24   ///< Main Oscillator Selection
00263 #define CKGR_MOR_CFDEN            25   ///< Clock Failure Detector Enable
00264 /*\}*/

00277 /*\{*/
00278 #define CKGR_PLLR_DIV_MASK        0xff   ///< Divider mask
00279 #define CKGR_PLLR_DIV(value)      (CKGR_PLLR_DIV_MASK & (value))
00280 #define CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT_SHIFT  8
00281 #define CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT_MASK   (0x3f << CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT_SHIFT)   ///< PLL Counter mask
00282 #define CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT(value) (CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT_MASK & ((value) << CKGR_PLLR_PLLCOUNT_SHIFT))
00283 #define CKGR_PLLR_MUL_SHIFT       16
00284 #define CKGR_PLLR_MUL_MASK        (0x7ff << CKGR_PLLR_MUL_SHIFT)   ///< PLL Multiplier mask
00285 #define CKGR_PLLR_MUL(value)      (CKGR_PLLR_MUL_MASK & ((value) << CKGR_PLLR_MUL_SHIFT))
00286 #define CKGR_PLLR_STUCKTO1        29

00292 /*\{*/
00293 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_MASK        0x3   ///< Master Clock Source Selection mask
00294 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_SLOW_CLK  0x0   ///< Slow Clock is selected
00295 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_MAIN_CLK  0x1   ///< Main Clock is selected
00296 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_PLL_CLK   0x2   ///< PLL Clock is selected
00297 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT      4
00298 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_MASK       (0x7 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)    ///< Processor Clock Prescaler mask
00299 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK      (0x0 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock
00300 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_2    (0x1 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 2
00301 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_4    (0x2 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 4
00302 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_8    (0x3 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 8
00303 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_16   (0x4 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 16
00304 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_32   (0x5 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 32
00305 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_64   (0x6 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 64
00306 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_3    (0x7 << PMC_MCKR_PRES_SHIFT)   ///< Selected clock divided by 3
00307 #define   PMC_MCKR_PLLDIV2         12   ///< PLL Divisor by 2
00308 /*\}*/

00315 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_SLOW     0x0   ///< Slow Clock is selected

00469 /*\{*/
00470 #define PMC_OCR_CAL4_MASK     0x7f  ///< RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 4 MHz mask
00471 #define PMC_OCR_CAL4(value)   (PMC_OCR_CAL4_MASK & (value))
00472 #define PMC_OCR_SEL4          7   ///< Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 4 MHz
00473 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8_SHIFT    8
00474 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8_MASK     (0x7f << PMC_OCR_CAL8_SHIFT)   ///< RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 8 MHz mask
00475 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8(value)   ((PMC_OCR_CAL8_MASK & ((value) << PMC_OCR_CAL8_SHIFT)))
00476 #define PMC_OCR_SEL8          15  ///< Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 8 MHz
00477 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12_SHIFT   16
00478 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12_MASK    (0x7f << PMC_OCR_CAL12_SHIFT)   ///< RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 12 MHz mask
00479 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12(value)  ((PMC_OCR_CAL12_MASK & ((value) << PMC_OCR_CAL12_SHIFT)))
00480 #define PMC_OCR_SEL12         23   ///< Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 12 MHz
00481 /*\}*/
00482 
00483 
00484 #endif /* SAM3_PMC_H */
